statements: UPDATE content_versions SET version_number = 2 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE content_versions SET version_number = 2, created_at = '2022-06-15 08:00:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE content_versions SET content = 'New content updated!', version_number = 3 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ContentVersions SET version = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Revisions SET revision_date = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE content_id = 3;
UPDATE ContentVersions SET version = version + 1, content = 'Updated content' WHERE id = 1;
